messages.title: My priorities
messages.content:
I've always been interested in the potential for political activity to transform people's lives for the better.

I joined the Lib Dems because they are decent, open-minded people with a more honest approach and a deep respect for the evidence of what actually works. This stood in contrast with all the other parties saying whatever seems necessary to gain votes.

Ewan Hoyle

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose the Conservatives' destructive hard Brexit
Invest in Scottish education and mental health

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Theresa May and the Conservative government

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose the Conservatives' destructive hard Brexit.
